xxl.applications.pipes.sigmoddemo
Class Demo.Query

java.lang.Object
  xxl.applications.pipes.sigmoddemo.Demo.Query
Enclosing class:
Demo
public abstract class Demo.Query
extends Object

Contains all information to demonstrate a query in PipeDemo.

abstract  void startQuery(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite c)
          This method is invoked to execute the demo. it can use the lower area for illustration (e.g. swtsink)
abstract  void stopQuery()
          This method is invoked to stop the demo. it has to clear all non graphical objects that were created for the demo.
 String toString()
          Returns a string representation of the query.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Demo.Query

public Demo.Query(String name,
                  String cql,
                  String image,
                  String queryImage,
                  String javaFile,
                  int[] verticalWeights,
                  int[] horizontalWeights)
Creates a new Query

Parameters:
name - The name of the query, that will appear in a comboxbox.
cql - The CQL representation of a query that can be displayed in the right window.
image - A path to a picture. It will be displayed in the left window and should be used to illustrate the query in general.
queryImage - The graph representation of a query that can be displayed in the right window.
javaFile - The java code representation of a query that can be displayed in the right window.
verticalWeights - determines the propotion between the space of the upper (consisting of the right and left window) and lower area of the shell.
horizontalWeights - determines the propotion between the space of the right and left window.

public Demo.Query(String name,
                  String cql,
                  String image,
                  String queryImage,
                  String javaFile)
Creates a new Query

Parameters:
name - The name of the query, that will appear in a comboxbox.
cql - The CQL representation of a query that can be displayed in the right window.
image - A path to a picture. It will be displayed in the left window and should be used to illustrate the query in general.
queryImage - The graph representation of a query that can be displayed in the right window.
javaFile - The java code representation of a query that can be displayed in the right window.
